definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: He outsourced the computer department and online customer service to Mumbai and Bangalore.

sentences.english: Remember, it's much cheaper for someone to resolve an issue online rather than having to call customer services.
